judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and ManderINO, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
pee Curiam,
The order of the Superior Court affirming the Court of Common Pleas in denying relief under the Post Conviction Hearing Act, Act of January 25, 1966, P. L. (1965) 1580, §1 et seq., 19 P.S. §1180-1 et seq., is affirmed.
opinions.author: pee Curiam,

attorneys: Edward Blumstein, and Elhman, Blu/mstein and Bloch, for appellant.

Linda West Conley, Steven H. Goldblatt and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Parsons, Appellant.
Submitted January 10, 1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and ManderINO, JJ.
Edward Blumstein, and Elhman, Blu/mstein and Bloch, for appellant.
Linda West Conley, Steven H. Goldblatt and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
November 26, 1973:
